Html.name: Html0
Html.content:
We have to fill the containers of the template with content. Therefore, we need content that fits into the containers. Use the HTML prototype's dummy-contents to extract which content types you need. Find out if you will need some lists or detail pages. Either create new modules for the content types or add them in your module my.template. Use the "Add resource type" tool from the module administration to add new content types.

Here are some links that may help you:

  • Read the topics on content in OpenCms.
  • Checkout what you can do with the page editor.
  • Learn about lists and detail pages.
